title: Olivia Confronts Max
text: OLIVIA confronts MAX about his infidelity. The tension builds until she demands to be let out of the car and walks off into the night.

title: Jai and Her Father
text: JAI packs food and chats with her DAD, who warns her about working at quiet places.

title: Jai Arrives at Work
text: JAI arrives at Benny’s Gas Station, clocks in, and chats briefly with MR. HUGO. A TV in the background discusses vampiric integration.

title: The Attack
text: A vampire attacks outside the gas station. V-HEAD #2 is fed on, the vampire disappears, and Jai is left in shock.

title: Sheriff Arrives
text: SHERIFF DARIUS arrives and finds no sign of struggle or victim, only wind.

title: Ebony Transforms
text: EBONY transitions from nurse to dancer, prepping her gear in the hospital parking lot.
